traits.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, Arlo Kettletoe can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand Arlo Kettletoe. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Arlo Kettletoe is {@condition incapacitated}.
